DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate clinical laboratory performance three brand name contact lenses three recently introduce multipurpose lens care solution ( test solution ) well peroxide disinfect solution ( control solution ) .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Laboratory Evaluation 3 Contact Lenses With 4 Contact Lens Solutions
DOC.criteria: 1 . The subject must read , understand , sign STATEMENT OF INFORMED CONSENT receive fully execute copy form . 2 . The subject must appear able willing adhere instruction set forth clinical protocol . 3 . The subject must 18 69 year age . 4 . The subject must willing participate 9month study . 5 . The subject must require visual correction eye . 6 . Subjective refraction must result vertexcorrected spherical contact lens prescription +2.00D 8.00D eye . 7 . The subject must bestcorrected visual acuity 0.20 good eye . 8 . The subject must current wearer spherical soft contact lens ( bifocal contact lenses monovision ) least 5 days/week least 8 hours/day month prior enrollment . 9 . The subject must require 1.25D cylindrical correction eye vertexing corneal plane . 10 . The subject must normal eye evidence abnormality disease opinion investigator would contraindicate contact lens wear . 1 . Selfreported current pregnancy lactation plan become pregnant study period ( subject report become pregnant study discontinue ) . 2 . Selfreported adverse reaction contact lens solution use study opinion investigator would contraindicate use solution . 3 . Any previous ocular intraocular surgery ( e.g . radial keratotomy , PRK , LASIK , etc. ) . 4 . Any clinically meaningful slit lamp finding contraindicate contact lens wear ( e.g . equal great Grade 3 find edema , corneal neovascularization , corneal staining , tarsal abnormality , conjunctival injection , blepharitis/meibomian gland dysfunction ) study specific classification scale ocular abnormality opinion investigator would contraindicate contact lens wear . 5 . Any active ocular infection . 6 . Current use topical ophthalmic medication . 7 . History binocular vision abnormality strabismus . 8 . More occasional use dry eye/rewetting drop ( 2 time per day average ) . 9 . Any infectious disease ( e.g . hepatitis , tuberculosis ) contagious immunosuppressive disease ( e.g . HIV ) selfreport . 10 . History severe allergic reaction anaphylaxis . 11 . Other active ocular disease opinion investigator would contraindicate contact lens wear . 12 . Employee investigational clinic ( e.g . investigator , coordinator , technician ) 13 . They take part clinical trial research , within two week prior start study .
